originalText.text:
Tamara is a professional extraordinaire.  Bullock Funeral Services ia a friend to the bereaved. Every family is important in their care. Congratulations Tamara Bullock and Staff,  I am a witness to the comfort and beauty you provide to the families that entrust you.
God Bless you Bullock Funeral Services.
Gary Smith

originalText.text: This is a Black owned,  ‚ôÄÔ∏è owned business. The proprietress is a Harlem native and person of good character. I'm biased I've known her since she was a little girl. I know her family. I also know that she takes great pride in her work and that this is something that she's wanted to do since her early teens. She's worked diligently towards building this business over several years of working with various funeral homes in and around Harlem.

text.text: This is a Black owned,  ‚ôÄÔ∏è owned business. The proprietress is a Harlem native and person of good character. I'm biased I've known her since she was a little girl. I know her family. originalText.text: Just wanted to say that the funeral home service can be a complete rip off if you are not smart to the business. But who is during this time of sorrow.  Being taken advantage of financially and just poor professionalism during this time of grievance is downright horrible and immoral. However, let me tell you this, Bullock Funeral home service is the totally opposite. Tamara Bullock is the epitome of professionalism. She listens and delivers. When my Brother passed away, Bullock Funeral Home was there to fully assist my family in our time of need. Tamara entire staff was very kind and professional. They also went above and beyond in customer service to meet our needs. Tamara and her staff, was nothing less than perfect in her work ethic, professionalism and compassion in assisting my family and I with the details in the handling of our brother's funeral arrangements.  I have nothing but high praise for Tamara and all the staff at Bullock Funeral Home. God bless you and thank you for everything. We will always use Bullock Funeral Home services.

originalText.text: My sister and I could not have been happier with the service we received from Bullock Funeral Services. Tamara and her team did an excellent job with my mother‚Äôs funeral. We felt seen, heard and cared for during the process of handling one of the most difficult things we‚Äôve ever had to do. They made us feel like family and we are grateful for the feeling of knowing our mom was in the hands of such a kindhearted team. If you ever find yourself in the need of these services, I highly recommend Bullock Funeral Services.

originalText.text:
Bullock Funeral Services is thee best. She and her crew has handled a few people for me and all I can say is hands down its has been the best company I have delt with yet. Very professional black owned business. My family, friends, and all who attended was pleased and had a lot to say about this company and it was all good news and appreciated conversations with them all. They all said they would use them. To the team you all are the best I thank you for all u did for my friends and family. Tamara you rock I pray that God will continue to bless you, your team and business that he will continue to give u favor. Stay blessed. And thank you again ü§óüôèüèæ

G.
